name: IMMORTAL BEAST
description:
IMMORTAL BEAST - Dynamic 2D roguelike with a wide variety of enemies and weapons. You will play as a treasure hunter who has decided on a desperate adventure in search of wealth and glory! You will go down into a dark dungeon and enter into an unequal battle with dangerous enemies! At each stage of the game, new enemies and weapons await you!

The game is a 2D platformer with roguelite elements. You find yourself in a location where you need to destroy all enemies in order to advance to the next stage. To do this you need to use the available weapons! Be careful, if you die the level starts over from the beginning.

You are an ordinary treasure hunter who has decided to take a desperate and dangerous step! You jump into a dark dungeon and now your main task is to survive at any cost, earning mountains of gold along the way. But all this awaits you only when you get to the surface.

The most dangerous enemies, powerful weapons and different levels await in the deep levels of the dungeon.

Game Features:
- Various enemies
- Pixel graphics
- Great soundtrack
